physical_appearance:This is a coat made from brocade fabric. It is brown in colour
 and features a repeated round floral brocade pattern throughout the garment. It has long sleeves and a flared hem.

sgcool_label_text:A boy\u0027s coat made from cotton-silk brocade. The coat was worn in Kutch
 by a member of the aristocracy
 but was manufactured in Hyderabad

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a coat made from brocade fabric. It is brown in colour, and features a repeated round floral brocade pattern throughout the garment. It has long sleeves and a flared hem.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A boy's coat made from cotton-silk brocade. The coat was worn in Kutch, by a member of the aristocracy, but was manufactured in Hyderabad, India
